-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A sanity checker for your git history.
--   
--   This tool allow you sanity check the history of local git repository.
--   
--   A <a>sane</a> history is one where there is no interleaved merged.
@package git-sanity
@version 0.1.0.0

module Git.Sanity.Internal
slide :: Process a (a, a)

module Git.Sanity
type Range = String
type Line = ByteString
type Hash = ByteString
analyze :: Range -> IO (ExitCode, Int)
gitLogParents :: Range -> CreateProcess

-- | Parse `git log --parents` command output and return a stream of commit
--   parents hashes
parseHashes :: Process Line [Hash]
filterInsane :: Process ([Hash], [Hash]) (Hash)
report :: ProcessT IO Hash ()
